Have you checked to see if the game resolution is changing for you without your intervention? If so, I've started having the same problem in the last week or so.

I believe it *may* be related to the most-recent Windows 10 "updates" and/or the latest Nvidia drivers, which came out about that time. Yesterday afternoon, my screen res was changing EVERY SINGLE TIME I had an in-game scene change, including quickloads. Unbelievably annoying. There's a mod called AnyRes which can help but when you have to use it constantly, the annoyance factor is high.

The thing is, it's not consistent. Two nights ago (Saturday) I did *NOT* experience the issue. The system stayed "locked" to the correct resolution for a couple hours straight.
